item.title: R 绘图中使用中文
item.description: 默认情况下R中绘图不支持中文 默认情况下R中绘图不支持中文 默认情况下R中绘图不支持中文 默认情况下R中绘图不支持中文 绘制图2-1 首先，绘制图2-1(a),代码如下： fiber.absorp=read.csv('~/downloads/data/paper/absorp.csv',sep=',',header = T) absorp.wool=spline(fiber.absorp$RH,fiber.absorp$wool,n=1000) absorp.PP=spline(fiber.absorp$RH,fiber.absorp$PP,n=1000) absorp.cotton=spline(fiber.absorp$RH,fiber.absorp$cotton,n=1000) plot(absorp.wool,col="DarkTurquoise",xlab="Relative Humidity(%)",ylab="hygroscopicity(%)",main="Hygrosopic isotherms of various fibers",type='l',lwd=2) lines(absorp.PP,type='l',lwd=2,col="DeepPink") lines(absorp.cotton,col="RosyBrown",type="l",lwd=2) text.legend=c("wool","cotton","PP") legend("topleft",legend=text.legend,col=c("Darkturquoise","RosyBrown","DeepPink"),text.col=c("Darkturquoise","RosyBrown","DeepPink"),lty=c(1,1,1)) RH,PP,cotton,wool 0,0,0,0 20,0.8,2.5,7.5 plot(temp.wool,col="DarkTurquoise",xlab="Time(min)",ylab="Temperature(deg)",main="Temperature of various fibers",type='l',lwd=2) lines(temp.PP,type='l',lwd=2,col="DeepPink")
